moves.name: Icicle Spear
moves.effect: Attacks the target two to five times in a row.

moves.name: X Sp. Atk
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Sp. Atk.

moves.name: Keep it Up!
moves.effect: Sharply raises the user’s Speed. Makes the user gradually heal itself.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.effect: Never misses during a hailstorm. Has a very small chance of leaving the target frozen.

passives.name: Snow Shelter
passives.description: Protects the Pokémon from damage from a hailstorm.

passives.name: Power Reserves 2
passives.description: Powers up moves in a pinch.

passives.name: Superduper Effective 1
passives.description: Powers up moves that are super effective.
